name: Nike
temple_description:
Nike was the Goddess of Victory in Greek mythology. She assisted Zeus to defeat the Titans and brought victory to the people.
She sometimes had wings and amazing speed, but otherwise possesses no other special powers. She was not only a symbol of victory in war, but also a messenger of good fortune.

active_skills.name: Heroic Charge
active_skills.targets: 1 enemy with the highest HP percentage
active_skills.effect: Guaranteed crit if enemy’s HP is above 50%

active_skills.name: Final Stab
active_skills.targets: 1 enemy with the lowest HP percentage
active_skills.effect: Guaranteed crit if enemy’s HP is below 50%
